logisim.changelog: * Compiled with Java 10 * Double click using Edit Tool to label a component * Finally added the Buzzer (I/O library)! * Right click on Pin, Edit Contents and enter the decimal value you want to set * I/O Slider, Value attribute * Graphics paint refresh rate was set at 20Hz, now is 60Hz by default and you can change it in Preferences/Window * Shift Register will show its internal bits even when set to serial load * A lot of bug fixes, optimizations and small changes
